verses.name: Matthew 13:23
verses.text: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word, and understandeth it; which also beareth fruit, and bringeth forth, some an hundredfold, some sixty, some thirty.

verses.name: Matthew 13:24
verses.text: Another parable put he forth unto them, saying, The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field:

verses.name: Matthew 13:25
verses.text: But while men slept, his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat, and went his way.

verses.name: Matthew 13:26
verses.text: But when the blade was sprung up, and brought forth fruit, then appeared the tares also.
